title: 客户端秒退
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Quite honestly, I wouldn't worry myself about that.

Time: 3/31/18 10:20 AM
Description: Unexpected error

java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Could not initialize class sun.management.ManagementFactoryHelper
        at java.lang.management.ManagementFactory.getRuntimeMXBean(Unknown Source)
        at uj.i(SourceFile:92)
        at uj.h(SourceFile:78)
        at uj.a(SourceFile:52)
        at file:///C:\Users\ADMINI~1\AppData\Local\Temp\%W@GJ$ACOF(TYDYECOKVDYB.pngbhz.az(SourceFile:1090)
        at bhz.a(SourceFile:419)
        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:123)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-- System Details --
Details:
        Minecraft Version: 1.12
        Operating System: Windows 7 (amd64) version 6.1
        Java Version: 1.8.0_101, Oracle Corporation
        Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
        Memory: 65533688 bytes (62 MB) / 441450496 bytes (421 MB) up to 2147483648 bytes (2048 MB)
        JVM Flags: ~~ERROR~~ NoClassDefFoundError: Could not initialize class sun.management.ManagementFactoryHelper
        IntCache: cache: 0, tcache: 0, allocated: 0, tallocated: 0
        Launched Version: HMCL file:///C:\Users\ADMINI~1\AppData\Local\Temp\%W@GJ$ACOF(TYDYECOKVDYB.png2.7.5.15
        LWJGL: 2.9.4
        OpenGL: GeForce GTX 650/PCIe/SSE2 GL version 4.6.0 NVIDIA 388.13, NVIDIA Corporation
        GL Caps: Using GL 1.3 multitexturing.
Using GL 1.3 texture combiners.
Using framebuffer objects because OpenGL 3.0 is supported and separate blending is supported.
Shaders are available because OpenGL 2.1 is supported.
VBOs are available because OpenGL 1.5 is supported.

        Using VBOs: Yes
        Is Modded: Probably not. Jar signature remains and client brand is untouched.
        Type: Client (map_client.txt)
        Resource Packs: 
        Current Language: 简体中文 (中国)
        Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)
        CPU: 4x Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-3240 CPU @ 3.40GHz

replies.author: w490254635
replies.txt_content: 你客户端的内存调太多了，调小一点，1024

replies.author: yhr
replies.txt_content: 怀疑是java安装的问题，同时你这java版本太老了，重装java并且更新版本试试吧。

replies.author: liulangfuwuqi
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: zhejichensha
replies.txt_content: 可能是内存调的太小了~建议1024 2048
